name: Jalapeño Popper Dip
description: Cardi B created a TikTok frenzy with her viral jalapeño popper dip video. While we love her singing chops, we’re challenging her dip game. And, this version doesn’t require a single jalapeño—the blend already has the hot peppers. The avocado does double duty here: it boosts creaminess, and adds a bump of fibre and potassium, which is great for heart health.

ingredients.name: fresh lime or 2 tbsp bottled lime juice

preparation:
1. Scoop avocado flesh into a food processor; add cream cheese and whirl until smooth.
  2. Add cilantro, yogurt, burger seasoning and broth mix. Cut lime in half; squeeze in juice. Pulse until creamy and smooth, scraping down the sides of the food processor as needed.
  3. Scrape into a bowl and serve with your favourite dippers. Try nacho or pita chips, or sliced cucumbers or peppers.
tips: Depending on the size of your food processor, you may need to transfer blended avocado, cream cheese, and cilantro mixture to a large mixing bowl and stir in remaining ingredients.
